pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption:
This is a stunning aerial view of a majestic mountain landscape. In the background, towering snow-capped peaks stand against a blue sky with scattered clouds. A serene lake lies to the left of a sharp, golden-brown ridge that dominates the foreground.

The camera appears to be flying at high speed, skimming low along the crest of the ridge. This rapid forward movement creates a dynamic, immersive perspective. The foreground blurs with the speed, emphasizing the swift flight towards the distant mountains.
